alert.note: Alert for Lee (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 02 at 3:21PM CDT until July 02 at 8:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 345 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN ITAWAMBA AND SOUTHEASTERN LEE COUNTIES... At 321 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Mantachie, or near Fulton, moving northeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Fulton, Verona, Tombigbee State Park, Plantersville, Mantachie, Evergreen, Fairview, Clay, Skyline, Abney, Mooreville, Eggville, Ballardsville, Kirkville, Dorsey and Richmond. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
